variables.description: Boolean if the inline autocompletes should be included by default.

mixins.description: Includes the styles for autocompletes depending on the theme.

context.name: react-md-autocompletes

parameter.name: light-theme
parameter.description: Boolean if using the light theme.

parameter.name: include-inline
parameter.description:
Boolean if the inline styles
    for autocompletes should be included.

usedBy.description:
Includes every component, transition, and typography including their
media queries if the `$md-media-included` variable is `true`. You can
modify any global variables before including this mixin to change the overall
theme.

context.name: react-md-everything

mixins.description:
Updates the styles for the autocompletes ONLY if the `$light-theme` does not
equal the `$md-light-theme`.

parameter.name: light-theme
parameter.description: Boolean if using the light theme.

parameter.name: include-inline
parameter.description:
Boolean if the inline styles
    for autocompletes should be included.

mixins.description:
Creates the styles for the autocomplete component on mobile devices.
This should normally be used within a media query.

parameter.name: include-inline
parameter.description:
Boolean if the inline styles
    for autocompletes should be included.

usedBy.description: Includes the media queries for autocompletes.

mixins.description:
Creates the styles for the autocomplete component on desktop screens.
This should normally be used within a media query.

parameter.name: include-inline
parameter.description:
Boolean if the inline styles
    for autocompletes should be included.

usedBy.description: Includes the media queries for autocompletes.

mixins.description: Includes the media queries for autocompletes.

Boolean if the inline styles
